name: Just Find- Spot the Difference
description:
Just Find - Spot Differences is a game which can improve your powers of observation. In this game, you need to spot the difference between the two pictures, focus on the details to find them and enjoy the progress of seeking differences!

Explore more than 1000 levels and have fun while you try to spot the difference!

Why you should try this game:

- Become a professional finders by solving hard and easy picture games
- Amazing pictures and photos! You will find it all fascinating!
- Use hints when you get stuck and need help to find the difference
- Relax and enjoy your time

How to play Just Find:

- Compare two pictures to uncover 5+ differences
- Spot the different objects and tap on them to highlight the differences
- Enlarge the picture to see hidden objects better
- Use hints if you need a clue to spot the difference

Try to improve your concentration skills, train your brain and find the difference! Sometimes it can be hard to realize what's different between two similar pictures. But do your best to find them!

Just find! And enjoy this game!
